page.title: 09LOCAL WEATHER
page.content: Our weather is very variable but it is quite possible to have rain all through the year. Our winter usually starts in November, but most of the snow comes after Christmas, around January and February. In Summer it is possible for the weather to be very warm and for it to change dramatically and for it to rain heavily for a few days. In our valley we can experience extremes of weather that other parts of the county don't. For example, we can have snow in the valley whereas other parts of the county are free.
